title: Quantum Shorts: Collected Flash Fiction Inspired by Quantum Physics
author: Michael Brooks, Jenny Hogan & Puah Xin Yi

description.standard: This book presents winning and shortlisted stories from past editions of the international Quantum Shorts competition. Inspired by the weird and wonderful world of quantum physics, the shorts range from bold imaginings of a quantum future to contemplations rooted in the everyday. They feature characters of all sorts: lovers beginning their lives together, an atom having an existential crisis, and, of course, cats. These Quantum Shorts will unleash in your mind a multiverse of ideas.

name: Quantum Shorts: Collected Flash Fiction Inspired by Quantum Physics
artistName: Michael Brooks, Jenny Hogan & Puah Xin Yi
